I travel here to relax, visit temples, go for a long walks and also take bath in Kaveri river. There are more than five temples in Talakadu and more than seven temples around.
Very nice and well maintained in such a small village. Worth to visit and go cover the Cauvery river as well

Arkeshwara Temple.knownFor: “ Isolated temple ” Reviewed September 5, 2013 This temple is located in an isolated village by name "Vijayapura". It is about 15-20 KM away from talakadu and can be easily reached by car, or any two-wheeler. The temple was closed when we reached there. We were told by local villagers that the temple rarely opens. Helpful? 2 Thank webgenius_1 Report

Maruleshwara Temple.knownFor: “ Third temple in the pathway ” Reviewed September 5, 2013 This temple is located in Talakadu, and is the last temple in the pathway that connects the three temples. The pathway further leads to the parking lot. The temple is located in a small premise and one needs to climb down about 20-30 steps. Helpful? Thank webgenius_1 Report
